channel.title: Education on The Portal of Knowledge
channel.description: Recent content in Education on The Portal of Knowledge

item.title: Moocing all around the world
item.description: I am always keen to learn new things and broaden my horizons. Therefore, I often attend free Massive Open Online Courses (MOOCs). At present, I have completed successfully more than 350 MOOCs (most of them with distinction).

item.title: Informatics tests (available in greek only)

item.title: Biology tests (available in greek only)

item.title: Quotests
item.description: This application consists of multiple choice quizzes to test your English language skills. But there is a twist. Instead of using common boring phrases, it features text from great quotes by famous people!
